name: bellbird
description:
THE BIRDS AND THE BELLS

probably the most fun ludum dare i've done despite being literally 2 days before my exams start

do NOT ask why the game's setting is so random it was purely derived from game mechanics ok

play as some horse who really hates birds for some reason!

kill all birds to finish the level!

all while every single block you touch is unstable and crumbles beneath your hooves!

BIRD

-flies

-gets stomped on

BELL

-drops without support

-makes a really loud noise but this game has no audio

(which is a shame cuz i think this game will benefit a lot from having sfx)

SCAREDCROW

-whiter than a bird even though its a crow??

-gets scared by the sound of the bell

OAT PELLET THING

-grants you one charge of NEIGH

-NEIGH can toggle between the states of the blocks

-can have up to 3 NEIGH charges (but that doesn't happen as of now)

ANDDD HORSE (?)

-you (?) apparently

-because i came up with the idea of "aha what if its like un-stabling so its removing horses from stables" because i didn't want to do another platformer game

-but i ended up having a better idea

-but i still wanted to use the same sprite so here you go i suppose

-hooves on first?

MADE FOR LUDUM DARE 49 in 48 HOURS!!! theme - unstable (cuz unstable terrain)

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/$269136 <- if you can help me rate :>

-made a few more levels + minor tweaks like an hour after the jam ended

-also i dont know whether to call it birdbell or bellbird help
